user_query: I am planning a family trip to Europe and need some medical guidelines for traveling during COVID-19. Can you provide me with all the guidelines related to vaccinations, including the required and optional parameters? Additionally, I would like to explore healthcare mailing services for potential medical contacts. Thank you!

TaskList.description: Gather the latest COVID-19 travel vaccination guidelines for Europe, including required and optional vaccinations.
Query healthcare mailing services to explore potential medical contacts that can provide assistance or advice.
